name: SCNParticlePropertyController
desc: An animation for a single property of the individual particles rendered by a particle system.

items.name: init(animation: CAAnimation)
items.desc: Creates a particle property controller with the specified Core Animation animation.

items.name: var animation: CAAnimation
items.desc: The Core Animation object defining the behavior of the property animation.

items.name: var inputMode: SCNParticleInputMode
items.desc: The mode that determines input values for the property controller’s animation.

items.name: var inputBias: CGFloat
items.desc: An offset to add to the input value of the controller’s animation.

items.name: var inputScale: CGFloat
items.desc: A factor for multiplying the input value of the controller’s animation.

items.name: var inputOrigin: SCNNode?
items.desc: A node whose distance to each particle provides input values for the controller’s animation.

items.name: var inputProperty: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty?
items.desc: A particle property that provides input values for this property controller’s animation.

items.name: enum SCNParticleInputMode
items.desc: Options for the input value of the property controller’s animation, used by the inputMode property.
